<p><u><strong>Handling for Difference Scenarios:</strong></u></p>

<p><strong>Voluntary Block</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>If customer want to VOL Block a number (Postpaid) however handset installment are still remaining then Contact Center Agent/ECE and FCCR will follow below steps;&nbsp;</li>
	<li>ECE/Contact Center agent will guide customer that remaining bundle installment needs to be cleared&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Agent/ECE will guide customer to pay the remaining installment&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Once all the installments are complete only then ECE will process voluntary blocking&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Note: Before the clearance of remaining installment , we will not acknowledge customer&rsquo;s VOL block request&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Block on Stolen</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>If customer want to Block a number having remaining installment on stolen reason then we will follow the below steps&nbsp;</li>
	<li>We will acknowledge customer&rsquo;s stolen block request even having remaining installment</li>
	<li>We will also guide customer that customer has to pay the installment otherwise handset (IMEI) will be blocked once the credit limit breach , Which can be restored by paying the outstanding amount</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>MNP process&nbsp;</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>If customer want to port-out a number,&nbsp;</li>
	<li>ECE will guide customer that remaining installment of handset need to be cleared&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Once total installment are complete only then ECE will process MNP keeping other checks in view&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Note: Before the clearance of handset installment, we will not acknowledge customer&rsquo;s MNP request.&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Postpaid to Prepaid Conversion</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>If customer want to convert number(from post to pre). However, handset installment subscriptions are still remaining then ECE will follow below steps;&nbsp;</li>
	<li>ECE will guide customer that remaining handset installment need to be cleared&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Once total installment are complete only then ECE will process post to pre conversion keeping other checks in view&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Note: Before the clearance of remaining handset installment, we will not acknowledge customer&rsquo;s post to pre request</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>IMEI Blocking</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>If customer fails to pay the outstanding amount and the bills reaches its credit limit . the customer&rsquo;s outgoing and purchased IMEI will be blocked which will be restored after clearing the outstanding amount</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Note:</strong>&nbsp;Where Handset is blocked and customer is calling from other CLI then it is mandatory for agent to add other Contact number in super office case.&nbsp;</p>

<p>Both can be entertained</p>
